title: H\"older estimates and uniformity in arithmetic dynamics
abstract:
In this note we study common preperiodic points of rational maps of the
Riemann Sphere. We show that given any degrees $d_1,d_2\geq2$, outside a
Zariski closed subset of the space of pairs of rational maps $(f,g)$ of degree
$d_1$ and $d_2$ respectively, the maps $f$ and $g$ share at most a uniformly
bounded number of common preperiodic points. This generalizes a result of
DeMarco and Mavraki to maps of possibly different degrees. Our main
contribution is the use of H\"older properties of the Green function of a
rational map to obtain height estimates.
